articles.content: Harry Kane can lob the ball from the halfway line directly over the keepers head and into the goal. He can curl one into the top corner from 25 yards out, while being surrounded by defenders. But whe… [+7233 chars]

articles.title: Brazil's World Cup exit: What went wrong for Neymar, Tite? - ESPN India
articles.description: Was it the nagging injuries? No surefire way to maximize all that talent? Whatever it was, Brazil are left to ponder what could have been in Qatar.
articles.content: When Brazil crash out of a World Cup it doesn't take long for shock and sadness to be replaced by anger in the country. A villain has to be appointed; usually it is the coach. And, after getting no f… [+6078 chars]
